item.title: 02 Feb 2022 12:44
item.description:
Last evening we were at MC. The plan was to get a swim in and head back home. Been a while that we hung out here. 8 years? Nothing much has changed. Which is great, because it did bring back some great memories. I wish I chronicled these better then. … https://t.co/CcauCyXq9e

Link to Tweet
